win."},{"lineNumber":234263,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一つ持っていれば自慢できるレア装備品を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He possesses a large number of rare equipment items that one would be proud to own,"},{"lineNumber":234264,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大量に保有しているアームズ選手がどんな戦いをするのか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"so it'll be interesting to see how Arms will fight...\""},{"lineNumber":234265,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それから、アレキサンダー選手も気になるとこやね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Also, Alexander is a contender worth watching.\""},{"lineNumber":234266,"originalJapaneseLine":"「先の鬼畜王戦争では人類側の中心で戦った","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He was a central fighter on humanity's side in the recent Wretched King War."},{"lineNumber":234267,"originalJapaneseLine":"　世界最強の格闘家さんですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"He is said to be the world's strongest martial artist.\""},{"lineNumber":234268,"originalJapaneseLine":"「知り合いやけど……えげつなく強いで〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I know him, but... he's ridiculously strong.\""},{"lineNumber":234269,"originalJapaneseLine":"「真っ当に戦えれば間違いなく最強なんとちゃうやろか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If he fights properly, there's no doubt he's the strongest, right?\""},{"lineNumber":234270,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なるほど、なるほど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see, I see...\""},{"lineNumber":234271,"originalJapaneseLine":"「去年の大会を大いに盛り上げてくれた","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Last year’s tournament was greatly enlivened by"},{"lineNumber":234272,"originalJapaneseLine":"　四天王の皆さんや、毎年出場の常連枠、","translatedEnglishLine":"the Four Heavenly Kings, the regulars who participate every year,"},{"lineNumber":234273,"originalJapaneseLine":"　死にかけ博士などなど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and the Near-Death Doctor, among others...\""},{"lineNumber":234274,"originalJapaneseLine":"「注目の選手は他にも、たっくさんいます。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There are plenty more notable fighters as well."},{"lineNumber":234275,"originalJapaneseLine":"　明日からの試合が楽しみですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm looking forward to the matches starting tomorrow.\""},{"lineNumber":234276,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さ、明日の闘神大会幕開けの第一戦は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, the opening match of tomorrow’s Tournament of Fighting Gods is,"},{"lineNumber":234277,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんとなんと＜エール＞選手と","translatedEnglishLine":"none other than a fight between the fighter called 'Yell' and"},{"lineNumber":234278,"originalJapaneseLine":"　レリコフ選手の戦いです」","translatedEnglishLine":"Relikoff.\""},{"lineNumber":234279,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔王の子同士の戦い、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's a battle between the children of the Demon King,"},{"lineNumber":234280,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どんな試合になるかワクワクやねえ」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I’m excited to see what kind of match it will be.\""},{"lineNumber":234281,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでは、また明日〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, see you again tomorrow~\""},{"lineNumber":234282,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あったかくして寝ぇや〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Stay warm and get some rest~\""},{"lineNumber":234283,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この番組は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This program is brought to you by,"},{"lineNumber":234284,"originalJapaneseLine":"　闘神都市を世界に広げるの会、","translatedEnglishLine":"the Society for Spreading the Fighting Gods City Worldwide,"},{"lineNumber":234285,"originalJapaneseLine":"　の提供でお送りしました」","translatedEnglishLine":"sponsoring this broadcast.\""},{"lineNumber":234286,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":234287,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":234288,"originalJapaneseLine":"「コパンドンさん出てる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Copandon is appearing...\""},{"lineNumber":234289,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、それよりも」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But more importantly,\""},{"lineNumber":234290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う〜〜〜ん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmmmm... "},{"lineNumber":234291,"originalJapaneseLine":"　強そうな人が沢山だね。","translatedEnglishLine":"There are so many strong people."},{"lineNumber":234292,"originalJapaneseLine":"　＜エール＞ちゃん、大丈夫？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yell, are you okay?\""},{"lineNumber":234293,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、そうだね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, that's right!\""},{"lineNumber":234294,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すごい自信だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's some great confidence!\""},{"lineNumber":234295,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あはは、やってみるまでは分からないよねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haha, we won't know until we actually try.\""},{"lineNumber":234296,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、それじゃあ、明日は朝から","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, well then, since you have a match with Relikoff from the morning tomorrow,"},{"lineNumber":234297,"originalJapaneseLine":"　レリコフちゃんと対戦だから、","translatedEnglishLine":"let’s call it an early night today."},{"lineNumber":234298,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日はもう早く寝ちゃおうか」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":234299,"originalJapaneseLine":"次の日――","translatedEnglishLine":"The next day—"},{"lineNumber":234300,"originalJapaneseLine":"街は朝から遂に迎えた","translatedEnglishLine":"The city was bustling from early morning with the long-awaited"},{"lineNumber":234301,"originalJapaneseLine":"闘神大会の幕開けに賑わっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"opening of the Tournament of Fighting Gods."},{"lineNumber":234302,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたはリセットと共にコロシアムに赴くと、","translatedEnglishLine":"You went to the coliseum together with Reset,"},{"lineNumber":234303,"originalJapaneseLine":"控え室で第一戦の開始を待っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and waited in the waiting room for the first match to begin."},{"lineNumber":234304,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう……私の方がハラハラしてきた……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... I'm getting more nervous than you...\""},{"lineNumber":234305,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんたって初戦ですしねー、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, it’s the first match after all,"},{"lineNumber":234306,"originalJapaneseLine":"　仕方ないですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"so it's understandable.\""},{"lineNumber":234307,"originalJapaneseLine":"ベンチに座って試合開始を待つあなたの前では、","translatedEnglishLine":"Sitting on the bench awaiting the start of the match,"},{"lineNumber":234308,"originalJapaneseLine":"緊張をほぐそうとするように、","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset and Shuri were having a casual conversation"},{"lineNumber":234309,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセットとシュリが呑気な会話をしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"to help ease the tension right in front of you."},{"lineNumber":234310,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さって、それではもうご存じだとは思いますが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now then, I think you already know this, but"},{"lineNumber":234311,"originalJapaneseLine":"　改めて闘神大会のルール説明をしますね」","translatedEnglishLine":"let me explain the rules of the Tournament of Fighting Gods again.\""},{"lineNumber":234312,"originalJapaneseLine":"「闘神大会はトーナメント形式で","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The Tournament of Fighting Gods is a knockout tournament format"},{"lineNumber":234313,"originalJapaneseLine":"　32名の戦士達が戦う大会です」","translatedEnglishLine":"where 32 warriors compete."},{"lineNumber":234314,"originalJapaneseLine":"「優勝まではざっと五連勝すればいい計算ですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To win, you roughly need five consecutive victories."},{"lineNumber":234315,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあ、その五連勝が難しいんですけど」","translatedEnglishLine":"Though, of course, those five straight wins are difficult.\""},{"lineNumber":234316,"originalJapaneseLine":"「対戦は一対一の戦闘。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Matches are one-on-one battles."},{"lineNumber":234317,"originalJapaneseLine":"　誰かの手助け禁止、回復アイテムの使用禁止。","translatedEnglishLine":"No outside assistance or use of healing items allowed."},{"lineNumber":234318,"originalJapaneseLine":"　携帯できない大きさの武器の禁止」","translatedEnglishLine":"Weapons too large to carry are also prohibited.\""},{"lineNumber":234319,"originalJapaneseLine":"「決着はどちらかが戦闘不能になるか、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The match ends when one fighter becomes unable to continue,"},{"lineNumber":234320,"originalJapaneseLine":"　棄権を申し出た際に決定します。","translatedEnglishLine":"or when a surrender is declared."},{"lineNumber":234321,"originalJapaneseLine":"　時間制限はありませんので存分に戦って下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"There is no time limit, so fight to your heart’s content.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんな物も狩るアームズ選手は押しも押されもせぬ優勝候補です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms, who hunts down anything, is an undisputed favorite to win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一つ持っていれば自慢できるレア装備品を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He possesses a large number of rare equipment items that one would be proud to own,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量に保有しているアームズ選手がどんな戦いをするのか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it'll be interesting to see how Arms will fight..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それから、アレキサンダー選手も気になるとこやね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also, Alexander is a contender worth watching."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「先の鬼畜王戦争では人類側の中心で戦った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He was a central fighter on humanity's side in the recent Wretched King War.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界最強の格闘家さんですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is said to be the world's strongest martial artist."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知り合いやけど……えげつなく強いで〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I know him, but... he's ridiculously strong."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「真っ当に戦えれば間違いなく最強なんとちゃうやろか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If he fights properly, there's no doubt he's the strongest, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なるほど、なるほど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see, I see..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「去年の大会を大いに盛り上げてくれた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Last year’s tournament was greatly enlivened by

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 四天王の皆さんや、毎年出場の常連枠、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Four Heavenly Kings, the regulars who participate every year,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死にかけ博士などなど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the Near-Death Doctor, among others..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「注目の選手は他にも、たっくさんいます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There are plenty more notable fighters as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日からの試合が楽しみですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm looking forward to the matches starting tomorrow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さ、明日の闘神大会幕開けの第一戦は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, the opening match of tomorrow’s Tournament of Fighting Gods is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなんと＜エール＞選手と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: none other than a fight between the fighter called 'Yell' and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフ選手の戦いです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Relikoff."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王の子同士の戦い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a battle between the children of the Demon King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんな試合になるかワクワクやねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I’m excited to see what kind of match it will be."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでは、また明日〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, see you again tomorrow~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あったかくして寝ぇや〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Stay warm and get some rest~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この番組は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This program is brought to you by,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神都市を世界に広げるの会、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Society for Spreading the Fighting Gods City Worldwide,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: の提供でお送りしました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sponsoring this broadcast."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「コパンドンさん出てる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Copandon is appearing..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、それよりも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But more importantly,"
"Hmmmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強そうな人が沢山だね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are so many strong people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞ちゃん、大丈夫？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell, are you okay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、そうだね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, that's right!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すごい自信だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's some great confidence!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは、やってみるまでは分からないよねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haha, we won't know until we actually try."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、それじゃあ、明日は朝から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, well then, since you have a match with Relikoff from the morning tomorrow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフちゃんと対戦だから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let’s call it an early night today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はもう早く寝ちゃおうか」
次の日――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next day—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街は朝から遂に迎えた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The city was bustling from early morning with the long-awaited

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神大会の幕開けに賑わっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: opening of the Tournament of Fighting Gods.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはリセットと共にコロシアムに赴くと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You went to the coliseum together with Reset,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控え室で第一戦の開始を待っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and waited in the waiting room for the first match to begin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう……私の方がハラハラしてきた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... I'm getting more nervous than you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんたって初戦ですしねー、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it’s the first match after all,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕方ないですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it's understandable."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベンチに座って試合開始を待つあなたの前では、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sitting on the bench awaiting the start of the match,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 緊張をほぐそうとするように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset and Shuri were having a casual conversation

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットとシュリが呑気な会話をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to help ease the tension right in front of you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さって、それではもうご存じだとは思いますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then, I think you already know this, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 改めて闘神大会のルール説明をしますね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let me explain the rules of the Tournament of Fighting Gods again."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「闘神大会はトーナメント形式で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Tournament of Fighting Gods is a knockout tournament format

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 32名の戦士達が戦う大会です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: where 32 warriors compete.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「優勝まではざっと五連勝すればいい計算ですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To win, you roughly need five consecutive victories.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、その五連勝が難しいんですけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though, of course, those five straight wins are difficult."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「対戦は一対一の戦闘。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Matches are one-on-one battles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かの手助け禁止、回復アイテムの使用禁止。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No outside assistance or use of healing items allowed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 携帯できない大きさの武器の禁止」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Weapons too large to carry are also prohibited."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「決着はどちらかが戦闘不能になるか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The match ends when one fighter becomes unable to continue,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 棄権を申し出た際に決定します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or when a surrender is declared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間制限はありませんので存分に戦って下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no time limit, so fight to your heart’s content."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

prohibited.\""},{"lineNumber":234319,"originalJapaneseLine":"「決着はどちらかが戦闘不能になるか、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The match ends when one fighter becomes unable to continue,"},{"lineNumber":234320,"originalJapaneseLine":"　棄権を申し出た際に決定します。","translatedEnglishLine":"or when a surrender is declared."},{"lineNumber":234321,"originalJapaneseLine":"　時間制限はありませんので存分に戦って下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"There is no time limit, so fight to your heart’s content.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんな物も狩るアームズ選手は押しも押されもせぬ優勝候補です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms, who hunts down anything, is an undisputed favorite to win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一つ持っていれば自慢できるレア装備品を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He possesses a large number of rare equipment items that one would be proud to own,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量に保有しているアームズ選手がどんな戦いをするのか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it'll be interesting to see how Arms will fight..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それから、アレキサンダー選手も気になるとこやね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also, Alexander is a contender worth watching."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「先の鬼畜王戦争では人類側の中心で戦った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He was a central fighter on humanity's side in the recent Wretched King War.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界最強の格闘家さんですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is said to be the world's strongest martial artist."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知り合いやけど……えげつなく強いで〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I know him, but... he's ridiculously strong."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「真っ当に戦えれば間違いなく最強なんとちゃうやろか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If he fights properly, there's no doubt he's the strongest, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なるほど、なるほど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see, I see..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「去年の大会を大いに盛り上げてくれた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Last year’s tournament was greatly enlivened by

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 四天王の皆さんや、毎年出場の常連枠、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Four Heavenly Kings, the regulars who participate every year,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死にかけ博士などなど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the Near-Death Doctor, among others..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「注目の選手は他にも、たっくさんいます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There are plenty more notable fighters as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日からの試合が楽しみですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm looking forward to the matches starting tomorrow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さ、明日の闘神大会幕開けの第一戦は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, the opening match of tomorrow’s Tournament of Fighting Gods is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなんと＜エール＞選手と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: none other than a fight between the fighter called 'Yell' and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフ選手の戦いです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Relikoff."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王の子同士の戦い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a battle between the children of the Demon King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんな試合になるかワクワクやねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I’m excited to see what kind of match it will be."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでは、また明日〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, see you again tomorrow~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あったかくして寝ぇや〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Stay warm and get some rest~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この番組は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This program is brought to you by,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神都市を世界に広げるの会、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Society for Spreading the Fighting Gods City Worldwide,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: の提供でお送りしました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sponsoring this broadcast."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「コパンドンさん出てる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Copandon is appearing..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、それよりも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But more importantly,"
"Hmmmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強そうな人が沢山だね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are so many strong people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞ちゃん、大丈夫？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell, are you okay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、そうだね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, that's right!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すごい自信だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's some great confidence!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは、やってみるまでは分からないよねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haha, we won't know until we actually try."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、それじゃあ、明日は朝から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, well then, since you have a match with Relikoff from the morning tomorrow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフちゃんと対戦だから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let’s call it an early night today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はもう早く寝ちゃおうか」
次の日――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next day—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街は朝から遂に迎えた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The city was bustling from early morning with the long-awaited

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神大会の幕開けに賑わっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: opening of the Tournament of Fighting Gods.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはリセットと共にコロシアムに赴くと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You went to the coliseum together with Reset,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控え室で第一戦の開始を待っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and waited in the waiting room for the first match to begin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう……私の方がハラハラしてきた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... I'm getting more nervous than you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんたって初戦ですしねー、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it’s the first match after all,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕方ないですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it's understandable."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベンチに座って試合開始を待つあなたの前では、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sitting on the bench awaiting the start of the match,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 緊張をほぐそうとするように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset and Shuri were having a casual conversation

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットとシュリが呑気な会話をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to help ease the tension right in front of you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さって、それではもうご存じだとは思いますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then, I think you already know this, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 改めて闘神大会のルール説明をしますね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let me explain the rules of the Tournament of Fighting Gods again."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「闘神大会はトーナメント形式で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Tournament of Fighting Gods is a knockout tournament format

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 32名の戦士達が戦う大会です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: where 32 warriors compete.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「優勝まではざっと五連勝すればいい計算ですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To win, you roughly need five consecutive victories.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、その五連勝が難しいんですけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though, of course, those five straight wins are difficult."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「対戦は一対一の戦闘。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Matches are one-on-one battles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かの手助け禁止、回復アイテムの使用禁止。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No outside assistance or use of healing items allowed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 携帯できない大きさの武器の禁止」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Weapons too large to carry are also prohibited."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「決着はどちらかが戦闘不能になるか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The match ends when one fighter becomes unable to continue,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 棄権を申し出た際に決定します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or when a surrender is declared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間制限はありませんので存分に戦って下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no time limit, so fight to your heart’s content."
